__SqlaTable__.sql:
with FullClientList as (
  select distinct CustomerID from default.customer_churn_data where CustomerID is not null
),
ClientsWhoReturnedProducts as (
  Select distinct CustomerID from default.customer_churn_data  where CustomerID is not null and InvoiceNo  like 'C%'
)
select (Select count(CustomerID) from ClientsWhoReturnedProducts)/(Select count(CustomerID) from FullClientList) as ReturnPercentage
